TextView.android:text: 3 Pull Ups (r) ---> 4 Pull Ups (b) ---> 5 Pull Ups (p) ---> 6 Pull Ups (g)
x4-5 Sets (4 mins rest inbetween sets)
7-10 Dips ---> 5 Diamond Push Ups ---> 5 Push Ups
x5 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
45-60 Seconds DeadHang Hold
x4 Sets (60 seconds rest inbetween sets)
30x 5kg Squats ---> 10x 5kg Jumping Squats
x5 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
20 Lunges (E/S) ---> 30 Calf Raises
x4 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
3 Chin Ups (r) + 10.10.10. Isometric Hold ---> 6-10 Dips ---> 12 Push Ups ---> 7 Chin Ups (b) + 10.10.10. Isometric Hold
x5 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
30 Seconds DeadHang Hold ---> 10 Bar Knee Raises
x5 Sets (60 seconds rest inbetween sets)
30 Sit Ups ---> 30 Roman Twists
x3 Sets (60 seconds rest inbetween sets)
20 Floor Leg Raises
x3 Sets (60 seconds rest inbetween sets)
60 Seconds Plank ---> 60 Seconds Side Plank (E/S)
x3 Sets (60 seconds rest inbetween sets)
Max Squats with 5kg in 3 mins
x3 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max Lunges with 5kg in 3 mins
x3 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max Jumping Squats with 5kg in 3 mins
x3 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max Calf Raises with 5kg in 3 mins
x3 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max Diamond Push Ups ---> Max Push Ups
x4 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
Max Wide Push Ups ---> 60 Seconds Plank
x4 Sets (60 seconds rest inbetween sets)
Max Sit Ups ---> Max Floor Leg Raises
x4 Sets (60 seconds rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
End of Beginner Program Level 2 - Week 2
RATE YOUR PERFORMANCE

This routine should definitely be repeated at least once (prefably twice) since Week 3 will introduce bodyweight pull ups. You should therefore be comfortable performing pull ups with the red band before progressing onwards.
